Package no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.items.consumables

Class Potion

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.items.Item
no.ntnu.idatg2001.paths.model.items.consumables.Potion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Consumable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributePotion, BasePotion
public abstract class Potion extends Item implements Consumable
The Potion class represents a potion in the game. It extends the Item class and implements the consumable interface.
Author:
Erik Bjørnsen and Emil Klevgård-Slåttsveen
